item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

Emerson Umbrella Center for the Arts located in Concord, MA is looking for volunteers for a painting event. This is a good opportunity for our Boston volunteers to involve in field of art.

Please check their website for more information:

http://www.emersonumbrella.org

We are seeking 6 volunteers for the event:

What: Be part of a team to paint a classroom and our Performing Arts space. Help us get ready for a new year of classes and performances. Help prep the rooms and paint them.  Wear old clothes and a hat or scarf and we will have the supplies. 

When: Saturday, December 29th  at  1 pm to 4 pm

Parking Available-Co-ordiante ride on the event page if you dont have a car.

If not The commuter rail is about a 5 minute walk from our building and we have ample free parking. See http://www.mbta.com/schedules_and_maps/rail/lines/stations/?stopId=52 for more details.

Contact: Kathy Warren, Volunteer Coordinator at kwarren@emersonumbrella.org or call 978.371.0820 or me @ 505-301-6872 if you are lost or need additional information.

NOTE: A firm commitment to the event is required. Please change your RSVP if you cannot attend the event.

Thanks

Phani

The Boston Volunteers

Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

Please friend Boston Volunteers Mascot- Paulette: http://on.fb.me/Of9QbB

Connect with your fellow Boston Volunteers
http://www.facebook.com/BostonVolunteers
Discover exclusive Boston Volunteer opportunities:
https://twitter.com/#!/BostonVolunteer

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Painting Project at Emerson Umbrella Center for the Arts
